website_summaries.verdict: A step up from the Watts and Aquasana with a five-step filtration system. "Wastes" a lot of water in purification process.
pros: Five stages of filtration with a high-rejection membrane that thoroughly cleanses drinking water
cons: For every one gallon of purified water, the iSpring "wastes" two to three gallons
Healthy minerals like calcium and magnesium are not re-introduced

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for almost 2 years...
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this unit for the last 2 years, but all of the sudden, about a month before the time to change filters, one of the filter housings is leaking. It's not leaking from the seal, it has a pinhole leak out of the bottom of the filter housing, which ruined the bottom of the cabinet it was in. It's tucked away in it own cabinet, nothing else is stored in it nor do we go into the cabinet except when it's time to change filters. Thankfully my daughter caught it before it did any more damage. I can't seem to find a replacement housing for it without ordering a whole unit...
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. The system fits perfectly under the sink. I highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Burgess

customer_reviews.title: "Ispring a leak" filter housings.
customer_reviews.text: 12-24 months and the housings/canisters will spring ("ispring") pinhole leaks in the solid body (plastic) of the filter canisters and caps. Randomly located due to unacceptable quality/integrity of the plastic components. 100% Junk plastic. Expect multiple flooding episodes, repairs and headaches due to poor quality (China) plastics. Do your homework on these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Schueneman

customer_reviews.title: Good product and supper support.
customer_reviews.text: The best system on the market. I've got two of them. One in the office and another at home. Moving to a new place lost couple of detail to reconnect in a new place. The service I've got from the company is unbelievably grate. I recommended this system to all my patients and everybody are extremely happy. You just have to change filters and enjoy water and the support of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Doc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product started leaking soon after we bought it. We paid $125 for installation and several more each time the handy man came to detect the leak only to find out that the product had a microscopic hole in one of the containers. Oh, also add the extra we have to spend in getting bottled/filtered water until we figure out next step. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A. Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Great water, but the unit stinks.
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with this unit until it started leaking. Upon inspection, we found the leak to be a crack at the bottom of the filter housing. We attempted to contact the manufacturer via email, but received no response. I have ordered a new filter housing, but feel that this should have been taken care of by the manufacturer. I would have given a higher rating, if the manufacturer would have responded at all. Also, finding a slow leak under your sink was not a very fun adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like heavy duty but it's junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this RO system in early 2017. The system worked well for the first year. We replaced the filters on schedule and continually enjoyed the taste of the water. Then the leaks began. A crack here, and another crack there. The system is complete trash in a little over two years. I suppose these are some of those folks who believe in designed obsolescence. We are back to hauling water from the RO machine in front of the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Good until it spring a leak from the manifold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this May 15, 2016 and tonight there was a puddle on the floor. There was water coming from my RO but every connection was dry, every o-ring union was dry & every teflon tape connection was dry. After searching for several minutes I felt a mist in my face and discovered a tiny pinhole at the top of the manifold. Well this unit is now garbage. It was great while it lasted. After disassembling the damaged unit I found large cracks inside two of the three filter mount section. For anyone wondering, my house water pressure is 48psi. This unit should not have cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the iSpring RCC7 5 Stage about 3-4 years ago and then another RCC7 a year ago (basically for parts). The Stage 1 filter housing cracked a year ago and severely leaked and caused flood damage. I replaced the housing with a new one and then yesterday the part which holds all 3 stages/housings cracked and more water damage. These are design and manufacturing defects, not from installation.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Revier

customer_reviews.title: Clean water is a must...
customer_reviews.text: Had considered a lot of other products before choosing this company and model, also the gold seal helped. Easy enough set up. Wish it came with longer tubing for more mounting options. Initial activation good be better thought out, clearing the charcoal filter is a bit of hassle. After having this functional for some weeks now it has developed some brief cavitation - only issue that I have. Great price, clean water, able to expand for greater filtering when needed, cheap replacement filters. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CASMAN71

customer_reviews.title: Great until it springs a leak
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this system in January 2017, had it professionally installed and loved it. Less than a year later one of the filters cracked in the middle and leaked in the undercabinet. We replaced the filter and six months later another filter cracked in the middle and leaked. This has become a six month ritual and frustration. These filters should not crack and leak at six months. iSpring doesn't care when we contacted them. We are going to trash this system and get a new one and it will not be from iSpring.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaBabe

customer_reviews.title: Easy install; comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping got the product in 2 days. We watched the video on how to install which really helped and preferred it over the manual instructions. Everything is included to install the RO; we only bought T-connector to add RO water to our refrigerator. Quality of water is same; TDS before is 140 and after is ~20 range. I think the plus is the price on replacement filter. We had whirlpool for 8 years but membrane started leaking and replacement parts was too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Long

customer_reviews.title: Canister leaked after two years.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the system for two years, right up until the time the canister sprung a leak and flooded my kitchen. It wasn't an o-ring it was the molded canister housing itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Formed pinhole leak in manifold after two years causing extensive damage to sink cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked as expected for the first 2 years, then a pin hole leak formed in the manifold causing a fine mist/spray that went undetected for an unknown period of time until water was finally visible dripping out the front of the cabinet doors. The floor of the entire sink cabinet buckled and now needs to be replaced. This shouldn’t happen after 2 years with normal water pressure and regular filter changes. In the end, I’m not happy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than water bottle
customer_reviews.text: * installation will take some time, but following the instructions will provide all the information and questions you may have. Note: Review the troubleshooting section. It will answer more of the questions you will have after the installation is complete. * I tested the quality of water, and I used several water bottle commercial brands. Many of the commercial water bottle brands were lower quality than the water from the filter water from iSpring RCC7. I recommend purchasing the water tester. This will help you to monitor your filters and quality of the water. * this is a great product. I also called technical support. They are super nice people.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great reverse osmosis system
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed over a year ago, and it works great. The water doesn't have any weird taste, and I like the temperature of the water. Recently our main pressure regulator valve to our house went bad and it blew a hole through the first stage filter housing. Thank goodness we were home because water was flooding our kitchen. When we replaced our pressure regulator valve we decided to move the reverse osmosis system to under the house. I bought several of the generic filter housings but none of the threads fit. I contacted iSpring and they sent me a new housing and pressure regulator. Shipping was fast and customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: fountained

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality product and service
customer_reviews.text: I could make out the clear difference in water quality and the taste after installaing this RO purifying system. The faucet is very good quality, and looks elegent. The customer service far beyond five star. Their response is fast. I recently had to change the filters, thats when I realized my filter wrench was missing (I might have accidentally discarded with package). I contacted the customer service if they can help with it. Francis, from iSpring, handled it in a very kind and prefessional manner. Very pleased with the product and the service. They support really well and stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: No More Tea Stains In Cup
customer_reviews.text: Scottsdale, AZ tap water is very, very hard and full of chlorine ( I think that it comes out of the Grand Canyon). My TDS meter indicated that that there were 495 particles in the tap water, but after installing new filters there were only 29 particles detected by the using iSpring RCC7 5-stage RO with an additional solid block filter before the RO spout. The directions for changing the filters are easy to follow. When you start seeing tea stains inside your cup, it is time to change filters (they start showing up after about 6 months here in Scottsdale. Customer service responds quickly to e-mail inquiry.
customer_reviews.author: HandyJay

customer_reviews.title: Two years great water
customer_reviews.text: The system has been working great.. Great tasting water and coffee. I also use it for my CPAP machine humidifier. Very little redesdale. Needs only a rinse out one a week. I added a float valve to my multi room humidifier and hooked it to the line going to the tank. NO more filling the humidifier tank 4 to 5 times a day.. Keeps the humidifier everparation filler working for over a year.. Saves on replacements.
customer_reviews.author: John Lorang

customer_reviews.title: 5 years of great water
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to provide an update to my initial reviews and impressions. This filter has provided my household with great water that I use for all drinking, including coffee, tea, and even ice now that I have it piped into my ice maker. I have changed filters regularly, but mine last 9 months instead of the recommended 6 months. Purchasing the large pack of filters has given me many years of fresh filters. This iSpring is superior to my previous reverse osmosis system in cost to purchase, cost to replace filters, and quality of water. The customer support has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: William I.

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 5+ years of use
customer_reviews.text: bumped the review up to 5 stars due to the first rate customer service. The included instructions were a little unclear on how to hook up the hoses and I was having trouble restarting the unit after changing the filters, but the fast, detailed response from Francis (iSpring customer support) helped me hook the hoses up correctly. Over time, it seems the tank pressure can decrease and cause the tank to have trouble emptying via the faucet. Francis again helped identify this as the issue, and how to correct it using a bicycle pump and a low pressure gauge. After receiving help resolving these two issues the unit is working great again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Starts breaking after a year
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product until the warranty ran out. I didn't have any problems, the water tastes great, and it was easy to install. Shortly after a year one of the filter housings got a crack and flooded under my sink. Then a few months later another crack in a different housing. Now a crack in the filter housing lid! Luckily I bought extra parts but when I was trying to replace the lid, the connector broke! I seriously don't trust this thing anymore to not flood my kitchen. If you want to continually replace parts after a year then this is the system for you!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: System Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to assemble. You should have good mechanical skills. The valves should be metal not plastic. The carbon filters lasted about 6mo @ 1-2 gal/day. We had a high chlorine level due to some main breaks so may last longer under ideal conditions. Fits under normal two sink cabinet with room for some storage left. Water measures under 10 PPM TDS was 350 initially. I think you really need about 60 PSIG for system to refill in 3-4 hrs/3 gal. Water waste was minimal. I recommend the unit after using for one year but installation is not for everyone. Waterflow out of system was a bit slow until I increased pressure in bladder to 19 PSIG.
customer_reviews.author: Freeradical

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install, I have installed several r o systems over the years. This by far had the the best and most complete instructions of all. And the color coded hoses is also helpful. The water tastes great even though the are I am in in Buckeye Az has some of the worst water in the nation. I can only get about a 78% rejection rate but that is not the systems fault . 5 miles from where I am now I got 95% this water is from a different city well the worst one on town. Very happy with my purchase and the faucet it very nice quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: desertdweller

customer_reviews.title: I'm no DIYer and I did it! Fixed soft water taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have well water and therefore a home water softener to protect pipes. But this makes the water taste weird (salty, slippery, just "off"). Well this RO system fixed that! It was super easy to install, I was able to do it all myself with minor help from my spouse. Now we have pure tasting drinking water. The company has easy to understand videos on YouTube, and the customer service is top notch. I've always had my questions answered in a timely manner via email. NOTE: You must have a separate hole in your sink basin for a filter tap (or I believe if you have a soap dispenser you can replace it with this).
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I bought the RCC7 system 3 years ago, but had only installed it 6 months ago. (Don't ask why) After 4 months of use the taste went foul. It was a metal-like taste and a mold smell. I called iSpring to see what could be done. Nick assured me that it was the tank and sent out one pronto....at no charge. I was willing to purchase a new tank since I knew the warranty had already expired after 3 years, but they honored the warranty anyway. I've installed the new tank and the water taste great. I would heartily recommend iSpring and their products.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyNaiNai

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic system, Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our home 2.5 years ago after we installed one at our business (coffee shop) and loved it. We are STILL loving it! Great tasting water. No limey scale in our coffee maker (home or business). Our home system has had two very slow leaks in the 2.5 years we've had but after a quick email and pic of leak location to iSpring, both times they sent a free replacement part immediately. Fantastic customer service! My parents in law loved our water so much, they went and purchased this system for their home about 1.5 years ago. They have had zero leaks. Can't go wrong with this reverse osmosis system!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, company, and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and awesome company! I have had this system installed for over 4 years and it has been installed in 2 different houses, and just this year it suffered from a tiny little crack causing water to leak out a bit. The crack was in such a weird spot that it didn’t seem like it was from a fault product or wear and tear so I feel like this was a fluke. Regardless the company and customer service are amazing and sent us replacement parts free of charge. Awesome company and so pleased with our water quality!
customer_reviews.author: marinna

customer_reviews.title: Company apparently defunct
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my second system about 6 months ago after its 3 year old predecessor started acting up. New system worked fine until recently when it started taking longer to recharge and making substantial draining noise. Tried to contact 123filter both by phone and email. No response in over two weeks. Phone mailbox full. Makes their warranty pretty low value.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product w/ Great Support!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product for ease of installation and convenience of drinking and cooking water. No need to go buy and carry heavy water bottles on a weekly basis. Just change out the filters every 6 months or so and you have great drinking water at your finger tips. NICK, from support also did a wonderful service for us by replacing a part for us 4 years after purchase for FREE. He knew exactly the problem when I told him what had happened and knew which parts needed to be replaced and how to prevent the same problem from happening in the future. Thank you NICK!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: FLOODED MY KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: AFTER SEVERAL YEARS OF USE WITH NO PROBLEM THE CLEAR FILTER CANISTER SPONTANEOUSLY CRACKED AND FLOODED MY KITCHEN AND LIVING ROOM DURING THE NIGHT. RUINED A VERY EXPENSIVE WOOD FLOOR.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Page, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Six years & going strong
customer_reviews.text: For what it does this system is a great value. In southern CA, with a TDS reading of 450 on tap water, this system reliability produces 75 gph of pure (TDS < 25) drinking water right at my sink. I have been using this system for six years with zero leaks and zero failures. I buy three years worth of filters at a time for $100. I had it professionally installed because i was too busy at the time, but think it would have taken me most of one day to work through it all. The customer service is responsive and thorough. You won't regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great RO system plus excellent and responsive  customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I own two iSpring 7 stage systems and have had a great experience with them. These are very nice units and I find the clear first stage housing very nice. I can just look and see if the sediment filter needs to be changed. Given that i have a system both upstairs and in the basement I don't need to change the filters as often as most. Whenever I have had a questions or needed something the customer support team has been very responsive both through email and via the phone! I recommend them and would use them again in the future. -Rich
customer_reviews.author: Rich In Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about three or four years ago. Have changed the cartridges annually. That of course depends upon your particular city water quality but for me annually is pretty good. PPM goes down to about 10 when new and up to 25-30 after about a year. System is easy to maintain and having a filtered water outlet conveniently located in the kitchen is nice. I hired a fellow to run tubing beneath my house from a nearby utility room up into the kitchen . I wall mounted the unit chest high in the utility room to eliminate any undersink mounting. I getting too old to climb under sinks. That made for a clean setup.
customer_reviews.author: donald wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice system for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these in last 10 years... both time they were great system and still using both of them. Reasonably priced, easy to install, and still using them both! Filters are also priced well and long at least as long as stated if not longer. Replacing filters are also quick and easy! I am a BIG FAN of the quick connects!! The best thing ever invented. Just cut to the size you need and snap them in and put a lock on it and done. No leaks and no tools. Definitely DIY system.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: The water from this system tastes great! I was using a Brita filter for our drinking water before and couldn’t believe how much better this water tastes! It made the Brita taste like I was drinking plain tap water for a year! I originally bought the unit a year ago when I bought my next house that didn’t have a r/o already installed....fast forward a year and we are finally installing and noticed parts missing. We were able to contact the seller, and after a few emails and explanations, were shipped the parts free of charge. So when I finally tastes the ending product I was extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Free Filter
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, There isn't any free filter anymore. There was a promotion for free filter supply after reviewing the product. Unfortunately, after reviewing the product, I got an email that it was for limited time and has been ended.
customer_reviews.author: Soroush

customer_reviews.title: It was great...until it failed and flooded our kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: The online materials were understandable and the filter worked just fine for a while. Then, out of nowhere, the sediment filter casing developed a spraying leak from the *SIDE* of the casing. That's material failure and not what I expect from quality equipment! Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: tworochelles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value. Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten two of these systems so far. Good product, no issues whatsoever. Good value for the money and the filter prices are reasonable. I had accidentally spilled some water onto the emergency shutoff valve/tab (which is a one time use) and contacted support about buying a replacement. They shipped me a replacement free of charge! Not only that, they followed up after the fact to make sure I received the part and had no further issues. Great company and I couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: BMovieBen

customer_reviews.title: simple and makes great water
customer_reviews.text: We have great tasting but somewhat hard water where I live. I wanted to make sure it was always safe and little softer. Water tastes better, easy to install, and it works and I installed a meter to measure performance. I usually have about 70-75 ppm coming in and about 5-10 ppm going out. Change the filters as directed and you are good to go. I did a problem at one point, and their customers service was excellent and they took care of it immediately with no hassle. Legit product and legit company.
customer_reviews.author: J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Years later and Still Very Pleased, with product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Five years later, we're very happy with not only our system (iSpring RCC7), but iSpring as company too! Very glad to report that they actually have a customer service department that stands behind their equipment. Purchased this in 08'15 five years later our system did develop a mior issue, but Nick took care of us! They even reached out to me!! How awesome is that!? Thanks Nick! Your help was greatly appreciated, super professional, and what a company should strive for in customer service.
customer_reviews.author: 2AH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: I chose the iSpring 5 stage Reverse Osmosis system because it is relatively inexpensive for RO systems, somewhat local in Alpharetta, but also because they are dedicated to making drinking water as clean as possible. They also have a number for people in Atlanta unable to afford a system and they award many a month. I am going to add on an alkaline cartridge for about $30. Install was really easy after watching a great video they have and reading the easy to read manual. It shouldn't take more than 90 minutes to be at the point of filling the 3.2 gallon reservoir and then 90 minutes to fill it again after flushing the first tank.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: 7 Years of Solid Service -- Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought and installed the iSpring 5 Stage RO water filter in 2013. I've been very happy with the quality of water and ease of use. Recently I did a filter change and needed some 'O Rings' and a replacement valve for one I broke while performing maintenance -- replacing the filters. I was so happy to speak with Customer Service right in Atlanta, GA -- they were very helpful and actually provided the needed parts FOR FREE to me. That is the sort of consideration and support I don't find very often. Hence, I am writing this review to let other potential iSpring customers that this company is 'The Real Deal.'
customer_reviews.author: L.Verde

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: We have had many RO systems over the years. The last one (Circle) was a nightmare! After MUCH research and evaluation, we decided to give iSpring a try. Honestly, it's a great system for the price. And the very best feature is the reasonable cost of replacement filters. The installation was just a tad more difficult than we remembered from prior systems. But the water quality is excellent (and we have some pretty nasty water!). Overall, a really great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cathy adams

customer_reviews.title: Filtered at 20 PPM and Taste Bad
customer_reviews.text: I used this after a month and it is filtering at about 20 PPM where distilled water is at 0 PPM and water from the Water Express mill is about 3 PPM. Not sure how the other water filter system will do. Only 1 way to find out...trash this one and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Offer & Poor Support
customer_reviews.text: Although I am happy with the product, I was annoyed that iSpring did not follow through with their free filter offer (in exchange for me submitting details of my installation online). I also attempted to contact them through their e-mail address with a technical enquiry, but never received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: BananaSlug

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FILTER AND AFTER PURCHASE CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS A+ FOR A UNIT THAT HAD SOME ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD NEWS IS THIS COMPANY REALLY STANDS BY THEIR PRODUCTS AND ONCE IT IS UP AND RUNNING ITS A VERY GOOD FILTER AND WE ARE ENJOYING THE WATER. HOWEVER, THE FILTER ARRIVED WITH SOME BROKEN PIECES THAT NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. YOU NEED TO KNOW IT TAKES UP TO A DAY FOR IT TO PRESSURIZE AND SUPPLY WATER TO THE FAUCET. YOU MUST HAVE A WASTE LINE DRAIN. CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS OUTSTANDING AND THEY GOT ME THE NECESSARY PARTS. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT WITH A HEADS UP THIS IS NOT THE EASIEST SYSTEM TO SET-UP.
customer_reviews.author: Mike's Review

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Drinkable Water!
customer_reviews.text: My wife Chris and I live in a California city that apparently gets its municipal drinking water from hell! So we were tickled when son Tony brought us, and installed, the iSpring RCC7 High Capacity Under Sink 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis Drinking Filtration System (Whew!). The result: water that actually tastes and feels CLEAN and fresh! I'm giving it 5 stars and giving 4 stars to installation and instruction quality because I'm tool-illiterate and just too darned old to crawl under kitchen sinks. Thanks, Tony. Thanks, iSpring.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Quarnstrom, author of WHEN I WAS A DYNAMITER

customer_reviews.title: I spring is the best in my opinion. Great after unit and awesome value.
customer_reviews.text: There is a little bit of work for the install but well worth it. I added the extra stage later because the water made me feel dehydrated. After adding the needed metal back in the water is perfect. My avg reading for tds ppm is usually in the single to double digits. My well water before filtering after softening is about 400 ppm.
customer_reviews.author: Imjaybird

customer_reviews.title: new O rings still leaks
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few years and added pressure limiter 70 psi all was good. 2 years after a few membrane and filter replacements it started getting harder to CONTROL the leaks so I ordered new O rings from ispring. Yet only by over tightening can i stop the leakage. Now I cringe at the next filter change!
customer_reviews.author: Diditdoneit

customer_reviews.title: Great RO system and amazing customer support from the company
customer_reviews.text: I've had this system installed for over 5 years and it has been an outstanding purchase. Keeps my water in the 5-10 PPM TDD range. Pittsburgh has lead problems much like Flint and it is nice knowing my drinking water is safe. The thing that sets this RO system apart from the rest in my opinion is the company. The customer support is amazing. Anytime I have had a question or needed a part they have been beyond helpful. Like imagine the exact opposite of Comcast. They really go above and beyond to help you out and make sure the customer is happy and everything is working.
customer_reviews.author: Si Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Filter
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second unit from Ispring, my first about 3 years ago, worked perfectly, I have recently moved and rather than disconnect first unit and reinstall, simply purchased a new unit. As a contractor, I have also recommended them to many of my customers. Had a small issue with first unit, Customer service was 110% they were right on it. Sent me a part at no charge. Would defiantly recommend any filter system they sell. They stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: rhs3502

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product with Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We've had this filtration system for three years now and have never looked back. Reading all of the comments and information in the comments helped us ahead of time know what to do for the installation and the water is so good we have a hard time drinking plain tap water now. I'm very thankful that my children are drinking water free of toxins and metals. We recently needed some help with an issue we were having and while we bought the product on Amazon, we contacted iSpring directly and their customer service completely helped us resolve the issue. They returned our phone calls and quickly responded to emails. Great product, great quality, great customer service-you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan Lynn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system 4 months later
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait some time while using before writing a review. 4 months later filter is still working great. Water still tastes great, and system is running smoothly. From installation to now there has been no leaking. Installation was easy. It helped having the different colored tubing & connectors. Did have a question/issue with faucet. Contacted seller & they immediately replied. Rep from company Nate(?) was very helpful in addressing my question.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: iSpring R/O water treatment systems  are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the iSpring R/O filter system in 2015. The system was easy to install and changing filters is quick and simple. I had experience with GE R/O systems in the past and found changing the filters to be messy, difficult and expensive. Last year I detected a small leak in the iSpring system. I called the company and they sent a free replacement overnight. I have recommended the iSpring R/O filter system enthusiastically to many of my neighbors and friends. iSpring makes an outstanding product and the stand behind it stand behind it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these systems, one for us and one for my parent's home. We consider this to be one of the best purchases we have ever made. Our city water, without filtering, tastes horrible. However, once we installed this system, we have water that tastes amazing. This system is very reasonably priced, and I have had great experience with the customer support. There have been a couple of times that I had to contact them with questions, and they were just a phone call away. I am very satisfied with this system, and have recommended it to quite a few friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment!!
customer_reviews.text: This reverse osmosis system (iSpring RCC7) is the best system I’ve used. The water taste better than Dasani and my water is extremely hard. Make sure you purchase from iSpring and not another seller because in 8 years the only problem I had was a needle size pin in the lid - when I tried to change the lid, the coupling snapped. I sent them a message and Don Huie at iSpring immediately sent me a whole replacement lid part. So greatfull cause idk how long I can go without the water!
customer_reviews.author: HollyB

customer_reviews.title: Housing is plastic and can leak
customer_reviews.text: I paid a licensed plumber to do install. My filter housing leaked water all over for hours before it was detected cause so much water damage, plastic housing defective leaking a lot. Re check for leaks after install.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: iSpring RO unit Superb
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly stratightforward and easy. Quality is high, packaging was well thought out and rock solid. Taste and water quality is amazing. I went back and forth between the Apecs and iSpring RO unit and am really glad i decided to go with the iSpring as I love the quality of the faucet, the see through first stage and the 75 GPD membrane. I contacted iSpring with a few follow-up questions and Don from iSpring called me back and answered all of my questions and was very informative. Good to know that they are there to provide support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: iSpring Offers Superb Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an iSpring RCC7 reverse osmosis filtering system in 2016 and I have been very pleased with the product. The filtered water tastes great, it is easy to order replacement filters, and easy to maintain. Most impressive is how the company treats their customers. I lost the wrench used to loosen the plastic filter housings, and Don offered to send me a replacement. That was above and beyond good service. I will continue to be a customer and recommend their products most highly.
customer_reviews.author: Scanyou

customer_reviews.title: Cheap canisters
customer_reviews.text: Filter works well however, after only a few years of usage, last month water started leaking from one of the canisters - found out there was a crack on the bottom of the canister. Unfortunately canisters were sold in packs so I ended up buying a couple. Now another canister is leaking. My kitchen cabinets have been damaged due to the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gomez

customer_reviews.title: What Was I Waiting For?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review. I've had the RO system for 4 months now. We recently had our public water lines flushed. It caused the RO system to make a loud humming sound. Nick, from iSpring was a lifesaver, yet again! He was able to diagnose the problem right away and mailed me the 2 parts I needed free of charge. This company provides the best customer service I have ever experienced! This system has saved us so much money & energy in purchasing water at the store. I am so happy every week to skip the water aisle at Shoprite! Wish I would have bought this system years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 2 yrs of use
customer_reviews.text: The installation was easy. The water tasted fine. We replaced our filters as instructed. The part that is leaking has never been touched. It was never a part of any filter replacements. Unfortunately, it was not discovered right away. The cabinet is flooded. The ceiling below is cracked. The clear housing corroded and we can no longer untwist it to replace the filter. Do we buy a new unit or try another brand?
customer_reviews.author: dixiedreg

customer_reviews.title: Stellar customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for 3 years. I contacted the company today to see about replacing a housing that had sprung a leak. "Adam" responded immediately and arranged to ship out a new housing immediately and free of charge. This is for a 3 year old unit. I contacted them about a year ago on another matter and the customer service was immediate that time as well. This company has stood behind what they sold me years after the sale. Imagine a world where all companies stood behind their product like that. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KP Wally

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and a Helpful Company
customer_reviews.text: This is the second system that I have purchased and installed. It is easy to use and does an excellent job at a good price. I recently had any issue with the product and even after owning it for several years, the company helped me with my problem and got me replacement parts free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very good filtration system.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it filters out fluoride. The TDS level after the filter is between 4 and 18 PPM. Not sure yet why it fluctuates so much but, the water quality is great. For people concerned with how much water is wasted: install a permiate pump in the water supply line. It will stop the water flow when the pressure in the collection tank equals the line pressure. no more wasted water when the tank is filled.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardaj

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: We had a RO installed by a different company at our old house for over $1200. We purchased this unit and installed it ourselves at our new house for around $200. It's just as good! Takes all of the chlorine taste etc. out and you can see the rust and yuck it removes when you replace the filters. After 2 and a half years our unit did develope a crack, and we were past the warranty period. However, when I asked ispring for a new part this month, they sent it free of charge anyway. Very pleased with the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal in the water
customer_reviews.text: My husband set up the system yesterday, we have now drained the tank three times and we are still getting gray water. That is not air in the water, that is not merky, that is charcoal in the water and we still cannot drink this.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: 5-stage RO water system works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home, mainly to use the water in my salt water aquarium but we also enjoy the nice clean filtered drinking water we get too. I like how detailed the instructions were for installing this and I was able to do so without any problems. The only thing I dislike is that I wish I had a bigger tank because it took a few days to get 30 gallons out of it to fill my tank initially, but I could probably buy a larger tank if I looked, it wouldn't be hard to install either.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sent water sample to testing facility - works great, as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great, the water pressure output is good (check the pressure in your tank before filling it). It doesn't make noise when filling, etc. One connector on a filter housing was faulty so we called and they gave us a free replacement. Thanks, guys. We sent a water sample to a water testing facility and it came up clean for everything (heavy metals were our concern). Of course, every water district is different. After installing your unit, send a water sample from this unit so you can make sure your unit is performing well in your area - though it shouldn't be a problem. Just for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Dina R.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, clean tasting water and easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of lugging bottles of drinking water so finally broke down and looked for an RO water system. I bought the iSpring 5 stage RO system and now I am sorry I didn’t do it sooner. I am very pleased with the quality of the water since it takes all of the mineral taste out, that was the most important thing to me. Shipping was surprisingly fast. Installation was fast and easy with the how-to YouTube video. And customer service is great; the faucet had a slow drip, so iSpring sent a new one right away. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzyjean

customer_reviews.title: Not a better system on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've been using RO for over 10 years for numerous personal and business reasons, but the #1 reason? It removes the unhealthy toxins from your water (chlorine, fluoride, heavy metals, etc., etc., etc.). In my professional life, it is the only thing I will recommend when consulting with individuals and businesses. And, in a world full of rudeness and overall discontent, iSpring offers the best customer service and technical assistance of any company on the market! Kudos to Nick at iSpring; thank you for the outstanding service!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service!Great Product and Service!
customer_reviews.text: I avoid drinking utility water and only use RO water. A big difference in taste and less salt and other bad things. I bought the iSping RCC7 about 3 years ago and it works great. I did have a tiny leak occur and called service. Don answered and from my description, suggested that the utility overpressure probably caused the small leak. It is very nice to have a knowledgeable person answer and be able to quickly determine a fix. He sent an inline pressure regulator and a replacement part the next day. Thank you Don! I recommend getting a pressure with every RO system as that would have solved my problem before it occurred. I'm impressed with iSpring's excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Scienceguy

customer_reviews.title: Total Perfection once you add alkaline mineral filter or two as final stage.
customer_reviews.text: Running this water to the fridge is the best. After two years I haven't replaced the filter in the fridge I left to catch sediment from the mineral filter. After two years its still the best water. It takes mine from tds of 136ppm at tap, to 5ppm at RO, then 40ppm after alkaline filters, which I stacked 3, but I believe one does most of the work and the later ones supplement as the first gets older. This seems to give thousands of gallons without need to change.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: 4 years later it's still working great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but to be fair I work on cars, so it might require a little more time for others. We did craft a wooden mount for it since our cabinets are particle board. The faucet still looks amazing years later, no leaks. The connections at the tank just now needed a little Teflon tape added but the alarm that comes in the kit sure notified us immediately lol. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: DStevensSATX

customer_reviews.title: Quality RO unit!
customer_reviews.text: ISpring is a quality company from start to finish. I have had zero issues with this unit. Purchased and installed in July 2017, regular filter changes are the only maintenance. We live in the country and water quality is always a concern. I had the RO unit installed. My plumber had no problems. Any tome I have emailed them they have replied quickly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: T Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is my third I Spring RO System that I bought. Why three? I bought one for my kitchen, then I bought one for my son's house, and I have a two-story house and my wife said: "it would be great to have one upstairs". So Installed one in the bathroom. It sounds crazy, but it works. I also told a friend about the I Spring RO, and he bought one too. They work great and would say get one for your self too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Was great until plastic cracked and leaked water all over the place
customer_reviews.text: Swore by this product for a couple years... seemed like great value and had loads of great reviews here. Had a few issues with gaskets wearing and needing replaced, no worries because they include extras and a water alarm for quick detection. But had one of my units fail yesterday with a crack/hole at the bottom of the center plastic chamber!! Also, if the plastic is poor enough quality that this can happen, how much plastic did we drink over the couple years of use?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Company Stands behind its product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After contacting the company regarding a leaky storage tank they immediately replaced the manufacture defect tank with a brand new tank, the New tank came quickly And I installed it and has been working like a dream ever since! I want to thank I spring water systems for their speed and free shipping as well as standing behind their quality water system. I have put these systems in all my homes and the homes of my family and would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonbluedogbrown

customer_reviews.title: Helpful support
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for more than 3 years. Installation is easy. I've had a couple of issues over the years but their support has been extremely helpful in solving them, sending me replacement parts when necessary. There are a lot of connections and when I first installed I was worried it would have a ton of trouble just because it seemed like there were so many potential points of failure, but by and large it's done quite well and the water quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: John Pezzetti

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a part from I-spring web site. By mistake they sent us the wrong part. After contacting customer service, my case manager Nick offered to send us a completely new replacement of all the housings. This is practically a while new system without the water tank. We received the replacement, installed it and now enjoying excellent filtered water. Thanks for going above and beyond your duties!
customer_reviews.author: S.V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water quality for very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this RO system. It was easy to install and filters are lasting for appropriate times. We have had a little trouble with the RO membrane, but pleased to say that the customer service is wonderful and they replaced the membrane with no charge. Very quick to respond to questions and concerns and very detailed in their information. Would highly recommend for purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Inchworm

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second RO system. Had another brand for about 3 years and it failed recently. Looked into getting a different brand and ispring had very good reviews so I went with it. Install was super simple, and the taste of the water is great. My water from the tap reads at about 375 tds and from the RO it’s about 23. Very pleased with this unit and price point of it and the replacement filters.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We have been very satisfied with our purchase of the iSpring RCC7,thus far. The customer service received through the company when directly contacted has been easy, helpful and timely. We also purchased the hole house filtration and have been satisfied with that product thus far as well. Both systems have been in place for 5 months. We test our water periodically and the results have shown to have greatly decreased particulates, I can not provide a breakdown for which particulates still remain.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Quality of water.
customer_reviews.text: We have had the i-Spring reverse osmosis filtration system for at least 6 years. It is wonderful. We use it for all our drinking water, water for cooking, and water for our two dogs. About 25 years ago our county had the highest cancer rate for our state. Even though there has been a lot of clean-up, I don't like the taste of our water. The reverse osmosis system provides us with great water. I gave "easy to install" only four stars because my brother-in-law installed it, and he can do anything!! (LOL)
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great RO System and even better company!
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy system to install, good clear instructions - really recommend watching a YouTube vid on it if it's your first time. This is the 3rd unit we purchased - for my son's first apartment. We have one at our sink and one dedicated to the refrigerator for ice and water. When we've had questions or problems their customer service has been excellent! Don helped me with a question recently and even sent a complimentary part to me cause of something I did wrong when I moved a system. Reordering filters/membranes is easy and cost effective. Changing out the filters is fairly easy too. Will definitely buy again if I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: alphamuffinman

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wanted better drinking water for our family in our new home. This system was relatively cheap and but well recommended. The system was well packaged in double boxes. I also ordered a refrigerator line. All pieces were present. I installed in the basement and ran a line upstairs to the kitchen sink/refrigerator. The installation was fairly easy. The instructions were simple to follow and the quick connect hoses are so easy to work with. In total it took about 2 hours, taking my time. Once the system was flushed the water tasted great and my ice is so much clearer now. Great product so far! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kmarshall

customer_reviews.title: What's to know is there NO MORE water bottle lugging and CRV paying anymore!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best investment that I've made for myself and health! So easy to install...a Caveman could do it ...great results and pure clean great tasting water. I've bought a new coffee maker since I installed my filter and after 6 months of use it looks brand new inside! Zero water spots and or deposits. I can't tell you how nice it feels to be able to have purified water for every use need especially cooking. Get one and enjoy healthier living.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas  Hunseder

customer_reviews.title: Produces very clean water.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first RO purchase and install. The instructions were clear and iSpring had videos on YouTube to make installation easy. All the water connections were easy and leak free. I installed it at my daughters house and tested the PPM afterwards. It showed 7 PPM which is better than my very expensive RainSoft RO that tested at 27 PPM. The tester says 0-50 PPM is in the RO range. I would highly recommend this system and seller to anyone looking for an inexpensive, very efficient RO system. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: cckidof68

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is advertised.. I found using the YouTube video was the best option. For installation and assembly.. probably took 45 min, was easy to install, had a minor issue but emailed customer service and got a reply within 24 hours and the issue was addressed that day, Brian from customer service was excellent. I highly recommend the product, it's been 2 weeks and it's working as it should, water tastes great..
customer_reviews.author: Peter mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Great filter system and great service!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this filter for over two years and we couldn't be happier with the quality of our water post filter. We live in an old house with old pluming and our unfiltered water has a lot of rust in it. And our city water tastes and smells like chlorine - not good! The RCC7 filter cleans it all up and we have great tasting water. I've contacted support a couple of times for replacement parts and they're fast and courteous - Thanks Nick!
customer_reviews.author: A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Watch install videos + patience + follow instructions = perfect filter
customer_reviews.text: Install difficulty will vary greatly depending on access to the water line and components. It’s a tight fit under my sink, so it took a little bit longer than I expected. Product looks and works great. I watched the online videos prior the install and it went pretty smooth. I’d allow 3-4 hours for installation. I had a question about the install and Don at customer service was very helpful. 5/5 would purchase again and it’s nice to know real, helpful people like Don answer the phone when you have a question.
customer_reviews.author: Jole

customer_reviews.title: Nice RO system for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes MUCH better after this was installed. It takes between 2-4 hours to install but is well worth it. More complicated systems might take longer. My biggest complain about all RO systems is they use way too much water to produce a low percentage of the water you actually drink. About 1/3 good water to 2/3 wasted water. Pros: -Instructions are fairly detailed if not overly complicated (good for technical people) -Water tastes so much better and is healthier for you. -All parts are included except for tools Cons -This, along with all other RO sytems, waste about 66% water. -Filters need to be changed every 6 months -Tank takes up lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Iamtheman

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous water system
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on a recommendation from a friend and I have loved my water. I had been using a Zero Water pitcher for almost 2 years, but got tired of replacing filters every month as the taste would change well before the particle sensor would say it is time to replace. We have now purchased a second system to install in our RV. The filters are more economical to change each camping season than any other solution. Bravo on a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Novak

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one to install. So easy..
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up for my brother in law. He has iron and major hydrogen sulfide( rotten eggs smell) In the water. Hooked up rinsed system and drinking water the following day. Tastes great, no smell! He and his family loves it! 5 or 6 people tried it and everyone stated how amazed they were. I'm going on my 3rd yr. Only changed filters because of flow. Sure beat bottled water and plastic bottles. Just sayin.
customer_reviews.author: FMB

customer_reviews.title: The only thing better than having a product that works is also having great customer support
customer_reviews.text: We've had this filter going on for years. It was easy to set up and worked great. It came with great directions, the parts were color coded ,it was easy to set up. My family has several food sensitivities including to some stuff in water. Drinking the filtered water even I noticed that there's less swelling in my hands and other joints. The only problem I've had with the system was my own fault. When we moved the system did not get drain and was left outside in storage for a couple of months. Freezing weather crack the number one filter casing. Customer support was seriously great getting a replacement filter housing order was simple. Thanks Nick!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Flow
customer_reviews.text: Our plumber installed our RO system with our kitchen remodel so I can't respond on the installation. The water flow is much better than any other system we've owned. The taste is excellent and there is no visible sediment in the water. I researched this RO system on reverseosmosissystems.com ( or something close to that) and this system was highly rated and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: KKC

customer_reviews.title: Great filter and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the filter in 2015 and had it installed by a plumber. Best decision ever. The water tastes crisp and fresh. We use it for cooking as well. Over four years after the installation, the housing on top of the sediment filter cracked and started leaking water badly. Needless to say I wasn't happy about it. I contacted iSpring customer service about it and my whole opinion changed. They responded to my ticket in 1 business day and did not hesitate to send a new filter unit as a replacement. This speaks volumes about iSpring customer service and that they stand by their product. I am a satisfied customer again and would highly recommend their water filters!
customer_reviews.author: occamsrazor

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Customer!!!Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with great tasting water. Replacement filters are a breeze to change out. I had a small issue after installation and called customer support. Francis talked me through the problem and rushed me the parts to get the job done. He went above and beyond to ensure everything was correct and that I was happy! Highly recommend for the support alone!!
customer_reviews.author: fescue56

customer_reviews.title: A great water filter!
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with it. I contacted them and "Nick" called me back and gave me exactly what I needed to correct the problem. I consider customer service a very important part of a purchase and they went above and beyond. We depend on the system and it functions as you would hope and expect it to. A+ to the product, the company and Nick!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: iSpring RCC7 High Capacity Under Sink 5-Stage Reverse Osmosis Drinking Filtration System and Ultimate Water Softener, 75 GPD, Brushed Nickel Faucet
product_meta.description: As the only top rated reverse osmosis system on the market, and backed by iSpring’s industry-leading customer support, the RCC7 is unequaled in quality, performance, and durability. The system consists of a 5-stage, layered filtration built around precision reverse osmosis (RO) technology that removes over 1000+ different kinds of contaminants in order to provide the best home drinking water filtration available. It features a 75 gallon-per-day capacity RO membrane, which is larger than most in its class and provides the capacity to economically handle the drinking water needs of even a large family. Designed for do-it-yourself installation by most users, the entire system fits nicely under a standard kitchen sink. Installation is straightforward and all parts necessary for installation are included. You are guided by clear, well organized written instructions, instructional videos and access to iSpring’s unparalleled technical support. The system is quiet and low maintenance with no moving parts. Replacement filters are standard sized and sold at factory direct pricing. A lead-free, solid brass faucet with brushed nickel finish is included with the system and is usually mounted on the counter as the primary source of drinking water, but output lines can also be connected to your ice maker, coffee maker, etc. The whole system is backed by a 1-year money-back guarantee, a 1-year manufacturer warranty and iSpring's unique lifetime technical support provided right here in the USA in Alpharetta Georgia. With the RCC7, enjoy crisp-tasting, bottled quality water, every day, right in your home. Chlorine reduction (%) - 99. Copper Reduction (%) - 97.
feature_bullets: High Capacity Reverse Osmosis water filtration for safer, healthier water. This under sink mounted water filter and water softener removes up to 99% of over 1, 000 contaminants, including lead (removes up to 98% of lead), chlorine, fluoride, arsenic, asbestos, calcium, sodium, and more.

Experience clean, safe, good-tasting water every time you turn on the faucet. Enjoy crystal clear ice cubes, fresher tea and coffee, better tasting foods, healthier baby formula – even better than most bottled water.

Easy, do-it-yourself installation, typically in a couple of hours with industry-leading help just a phone call away. Fits under a standard kitchen sink, with all parts included and clear, well-organized instructions and videos. For leak-free installation, simply push tubing ½ inch deep into quick-fitting connectors and lock - no threading pipes needed.
Premium quality components ensure highest reliability and low maintenance for many years to come. Clear see-through 1st stage housing makes filter inspection a snap.

Features beautiful European-designed brushed nickel all-metal faucet and clear see-through 1st stage housing. Backed by a 1-year Manufacturer with lifetime support line 678-261-7611 from Alpharetta, GA USA.

specifications.Included Components: Housings, filters, parts and tubings, faucet and mounting bracket
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,129 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
